alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 6:52PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Walker and northwestern Jefferson Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 652 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Burnwell, or over Dora, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Birmingham, Sumiton, Cordova, Dora, Pleasant Grove, Adamsville, Graysville, Sylvan Springs, Mulga, Maytown, West Jefferson, Edgewater, McDonald Chapel, Burnwell, Beloit, Quinton, Minor, Forestdale, Barney and Birmingport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
